comments.author: Ann
comments.content: We went there in May.  Excellent lemon drink with mint - must be tried, and very good (large) "sandwiches".  Hoping to go back soon. Have not got the street address - but it is in the main square near the post office. Looking at Google map - possibly HaYarden

comments.author: Jack
comments.content: I've found some details about the place check it out http://www.restaurants.co.il/home/companies.aspx?mCatID=14855&sme=348&la=1&lc=101&icID=2302&st=%20*%20Street
